summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2001 FOREST RIVER CEDAR CREEK.  THE VEHICLE HAS A DOMETIC REFRIGERATOR, MODEL RM2852.  THE CONTACT NOTICED THAT THE REFRIGERATOR WAS INOPERATIVE AND THAT THERE WAS A YELLOWISH RESIDUE OUTSIDE OF THE UNIT.  SHE TOOK HER VEHICLE TO A LOCAL RV SERVICE STATION AND WAS INFORMED THAT HER EQUIPMENT WAS LEAKING AMMONIA.  DOMETIC STATED THAT HER VIN WAS EXCLUDED FROM NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 08E032000 (EQUIPMENT); THEREFORE, SHE WOULD BE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE REPAIR COSTS.  THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE NOT APPLICABLE.   UPDATED 08/20/08 *BF   MODEL NUMBER RM2852 SERIAL NUMBER 10204076. UPDATED 08/21/08
